description.text1: For more than 10 years we have formed work teams that provide technological services to companies that seek efficient operation of their computing resources.
description.text2: Our identity is defined by three pillars of work:
description.text3: We are curious. We believe that there is always something more to see, to learn and to improve. We want to take knowledge to the next level
description.text4: We are colleagues. Both internally and externally, we seek to create networks and committed working relationships, together we are better
description.text5: We are agile. We know where to focus on emergencies and how to prioritize the necessary actions to find solutions and achieve objectives

service1.title: CONSULTANCY
service1.descr4: IT asset backup policies and procedures.

WorkWithUs.title: WORK WITH US
WorkWithUs.subtitle: If you are interested in joining our team, please complete the following form.

WorkWithUs.salaryExpectation: salary expectation for full time shift

formSent.text2: We will evaluate your profile shortly and you will receive feedback from our staff.
formSent.text3: If a vacancy becomes available, you will be considered!
